text: The Plaxton Primo was body of a minibus. It was made from 2005 to 2010 by Plaxton. The Primo body could be built on the Enterprise Bus Plasma chassis. The chassis was made by Hungarian chassis maker Enterprise Bus. == Gallery == File:Hayton's.jpg|Haytonâ€™s Plaxton Primo in 2009 File:Countryliner PP1 KX06 LYP rear.JPG|Countryliner Plaxton Primo rear in 2009 File:Plasma bus on bus line 17, Tesco terminal, Eger.jpg|Enterprise Plasma in Hungary in 2014 == References == ==Other websites== * * Primo
title: Plaxton Primo
